_header: O queen of mercy and of grace
Subjects: Virgin Mary, carols to; carols, to Virgin Mary
_description: James Ryman, a hymn to the Virgin Mary — twelve quatrains (aaab) with alternating refrains: ‘O clemens o pia’ and ‘O dulcis Maria’, which are joined in the burden

CULEe112.First Lines:
O quene of mercy and of graceOoure comforte in euery
                    case…
CULEe112.Last Lines: …That we in fere to hym may appereO dulcis maria
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.

             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 180-1.
Greene,  Richard Leighton.

            1977: 146-7; 1977, 130.
